data/tweet-crypto/2020/12/13400633262027:
FinCEN has proposed a new rule extending AML regulation to "unhosted wallets."

If adopted, the rule would require regulated companies to verify the name & address of non-custodial wallet users for any transaction > $3k.

Public comments are due January 4.
https://t.co/RjqHcI1YpB

data/tweet-crypto/2020/12/13376815398203: MicroStrategy is not an investment company (IC) per the 1940 Investment Co. Act.  An IC is a co. that invests ≥ 40% of assets (less cash & govt securities) in “securities”.  Per the SEC, #BTC isn’t a security.   Ergo, holding BTC doesn’t cause MicroStrategy to become an IC.
